Always call this before distributing signer payments"},"revokeFunderBond(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"Called only by notifyFundingTimeout"},"validateAndParseFundingSPVProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Stateless SPV Proof & Bitcoin tx format documented
